column4: hi...how can i set a pcs network settings from dhcp to static ip from the command line? using ubuntu 5.10...thank you
change the /etc/network/interfaces file, so that it says "inface eth0 inet static [newline]  adress 000.000.000.000"
you shouldn't take my example literally - Replace "eth0" with your default network device, and replace "000.000.000.000" with the IP you want
